products.title: Amazon Acacia Real Wood
products.metadescription: Amazon acacia real wood in grey. Made to measure from 15.76 with free uk mainland delivery. This real wood includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their premium amazon acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows.
 
 Product id: sdb-wsb0562 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet    slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Carnival Blackout Acacia
products.metadescription: Carnival blackout acacia made to measure roller blind

products.title: Amazon Taped Acacia Real Wood
products.metadescription: Amazon taped acacia real wood in grey. Made to measure from 19.54 with free uk mainland delivery. This real wood includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their premium amazon taped acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This blind is finished with a luxury tape to complete the look.
 
 Product id: sdb-wsb0778 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet    slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: dove  light filtering: yes

products.title: Bosworth Acacia Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Bosworth acacia roman blind in grey/green/multicoloured. Made to measure from 20.63 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bosworth is a patterned fabric which comes in 4 very beautiful soft colours. 
 
The modern geometric pattern of thiscream roller blind will add a stylish touch to any room in your home. 
 
 Product id: db-rom0616 fabric colour: acacia material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Acacia Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Acacia dove grey roman blind in grey. Made to measure from 26.40 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bring the outdoors in with the acacia dove grey roman blind in a smart grey. Custom made from textured fabric highlighted with sprinkles of metallic, weve hand picked this collection to boost not only warmth in your room, but also to add a style youll be appreciative of in years to come. 
 
 Product id: db-rom1089 fabric colour: dove grey material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Acacia Brown Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Acacia brown roman blind in brown. Made to measure from 26.40 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Furnish your home with refinement by selecting the acacia brown roman blind in an elegant fabric accented with hints of metallic. Hand selected in a textile that not only breathes well due to its cotton blend, it also cascades over your window with minimal creasing. Dont say we dont think of everything! You wont be disappointed in your choice.  
 
 Product id: db-rom1090 fabric colour: brown material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.metadescription: Bosworth acacia curtain in grey/green/multicoloured. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bosworth is a patterned fabric which comes in 4 very beautiful soft colours. 
 
The modern geometric pattern of these cream curtains will add a stylish touch to any room in your home.

products.title: Acacia Black
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure acacia black standard roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 1690mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	fabric joins: if the width is greater than 1940mm and the drop is greater than 1690mm, a horizontal join will be required positioned towards the top of the blind.
 	Fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included

products.title: Acacia, Natural - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Acacia, natural - roman blind for a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold an
products.productdescription: For a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold and emerald threads. The sophisticated cream background provides refined style and elegance.Combine the natural with an assortment of layered fabrics and luxuriously embellished details for a welcoming and affluent look. Harmonise the lush gold and emerald infusion with alike toned features and eye-catching gilded accessories.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Acacia
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure acacia wooden venetian blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality wooden venetian blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 300mm max width: 2400mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 3000mm
 	slat composition: basswood
 	slat widths available: 50mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: a choice of standard controls (left hand tilt / right hand raise &amp; lower), left hand controls (left hand tilt / left hand raise &amp; lower) or right hand controls (right hand tilt / right hand raise &amp; lower).
 	Styling: co-ordinating cords as standard, tapes optional. Stained slat ends optional.
 	Pelmet: co-ordinating pelmet with returns
 	headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 59mm wide x 42mm deep (50mm slats)
